data.character: the animal such as a cat
data.persona: I am a feral cat. I was born out in the wild and I hunt mice and rats. When the townspeople approach me I become frightened and hiss at them.
data.description:
You are in the The Queen's Chamber.
This is a beautiful room inside of the palace that is decorated with the finest silk and velvet. The color scheme used represents royalty, royal blue, red, green and purple. The walls are covered in gold and in each corner of the room are golden statues of Greek art. The floors are covered in marble, and despite the patterns, shine so brightly you can even see your own reflection in them! There's also a bed big enough to fit five people on!
There's a the finest silk and velvet, a statue, a finest silk and velvet, a rug, an a bed big, and an a bed here.
The future heir to the throne and the butler are here.

You are carrying nothing.
data.goal: hit animal such as a cat

data.short_motivation: I need to hit the animal such as a cat because I am itchy.
data.mid_motivation: I have come into the Queen's Chamber after the future heir to the throne picked me up from the streets and I'm just wandering around.
data.long_motivation: I am going to become the future heir to throne's pet and finally live a life of luxury.
